FAQ / Wave 4 / Characters /
View On FortressMaximus.io

Sergeant Six-Gun - Artillery - Soldier

  1. If I have a Weapon in my hand that gives an attack bonus because of an ability in its text box, will that bonus count for Six-Gun’s ability? [Source: WotC]
    No. You can scrap a Weapon only if it has a + number in the orange stats box.
  2. Interesting Sergeant Six-Gun question. If I have both of his Upgrades on one character, and say an Armor in his Armor slot (so in this case Six-Gun’s Upgrades are in Weapon and Utility, respectively), can I scrap said armor to put on a Utility? One of his guns says you can put in Armor or Utility slots but I'm not sure if you could scrap one to play the other. [Source: WotC]
    No. You choose the slots when you attach the upgrades to the character.
